storyInfo: Vanilla is sent to take care of an Originium slug attack. She thought her knowledge of the slugs would help her handle this case with ease, but theory and practice are two different animals.

attributes.content: 7:40 A.M. \ Cloudy
Outside a Kazimierz village
By the way, Vanilla, there's something I've been meaning to ask you.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: What do you usually feed Kuro?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Kuro's not a picky eater. He's usually happy to eat whatever veggies or meat I give him.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If you keep feeding them, do they grow up?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Of course. When I first got Kuro, he was only as big as my palm, and now he's—Hm, why don't you come take a look yourself, Chard? He's really cute!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I heard that when Provence and Skyfire were out on a mission in Siesta, they came across a huge Originium slug—as big as a small mountain.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Apparently it ate some kind of rock called... obsidian to grow that big.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: It's true that Originium slugs' body sizes can vary greatly depending on the environment they live in, but a small mountain?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If you fed Kuro some obsidian, maybe he'll grow that big too? It'd be really cool to take to the battlefield riding on him, don't you think?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Chard—Don't ever do that.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Uhh... Vanilla's glaring at me!)
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Oh, looks like we're here.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Let's see. The map's direction checks out. The village's name... Rockvile. Yeah, this is the place.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What's going on? This looks like a normal village to me. Forget about mutant Originium slugs. I haven't seen so much as a single slug on our way here.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Though I guess most Columbian monster movies start out like this?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: (Movie... Is that the kind of pictures that move in the screens?)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's true... but Originium slugs are very common creatures, and we haven't even seen one on the way here. Doesn't that seem kind of strange?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What should we do now? Take a stroll around? Or wait for our contact to come get us?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hold on... Is it just me or I smell something really nice?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: This seems familiar... This fragrance...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hops!
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Now I remember! The mission handbook says this village's main product is beer.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: We're allowed to bring back some souvenirs, right? Dr. Kal'tsit won't mind, will she?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Um, Chard, please focus on the mission at hand.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Before our departure, Instructor Dobermann reiterated several times that this is a very important mission.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Take a look at these reports.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: My goodness... Originium slugs attacks are leaving villagers heavily wounded and their farms destroyed?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Some of the wounded have been transferred to Rhodes Island from a nearby hospital. They are all from the same village, and all of them were injured in an Originium slug attack.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Aside from patching the wounded up, the villagers also wanted us to take care of the Originium slug problem for them.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: The hospital was worried that they'd be infected and sent them here. Thankfully, they're only hurt. None of them are infected.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But... unless they are under the control of Casters, wild Originium slugs don't normally attack humans, much less charge into human settlements.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: There must be a reason for something like this to happen.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: According to the villagers, it was an extraordinarily huge mutant Originium slug that attacked their village.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: A mutant?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We don't know anything more concrete than that, but we mustn't sit by idly when the villagers there are seeking our help, with no one else to turn to.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: That's why I would like you to investigate this for us. Of course, you'll have other operators assisting you, but I'm leaving you in charge of all the decision-making during this mission.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: But, Instructor Dobermann, are you sure you want me to take on a mission that has to do with Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Listen, Vanilla. This isn't a test. This is a serious problem that needs your knowledge and skills to solve. This is not the time to push your luck.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: I trust that you will take care of this, Operator Vanilla.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Y-Yes!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (I never thought I'd get to take on a whole mission myself like Liskarm and Franka.)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (If Instructor Dobermann's willing to put her trust in me, then I can't let her down!)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (If I don't finish this mission, I'll definitely get my pay docked. Kuro and I will starve!)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: That's why you need to treat this mission seriously, Chard. Don't get distracted until the mission is done!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: R-Right...
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: (Why is she so serious all of a sudden?!)
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Excuse me, but are you two the Rhodes Island employees?
Hello! You must be...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I am the chief of the village. I am the one who reached out to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Finally...
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Huh? Are we too late? But it doesn't look like anything happened around here—
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Come with me...
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: My goodness!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You mean... this whole plantation was destroyed by Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: It was about a month ago. One night, the villagers heard someone call for help from the plantation.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Everyone hurried over, only to find the nighttime guard lying on the ground, badly injured and on his last legs. The plantation was just as you see it now.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: It took three whole days for him to come to.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: From what he told us, that night, he heard noises out in the fields. He thought it was thieves and went closer to check it out, only to find about a dozen Originium slugs.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Hold on. Did he really make out how many slugs there were in such a dense forest at night?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: According to him, the smallest of them was as tall as a person, while the largest was about the size of a small house.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Phew... Now that's really straight out of a monster movie.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Is it possible that his eyes were playing tricks on him, and they were some other kind of wild beast?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: It's true that these bites are far bigger than what you'd expect from an Originium slug.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Vanilla... Have you seen slugs this big?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Right, no one believed him at first. A few of our young'uns then formed a search team and went to the hills behind the village to investigate.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: We looked all over, and we finally got a clear view of it. It was really a giant Originium slug... The search team got ambushed too, and quite a few of them got seriously hurt.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: We stopped going outside the village after that, but the slugs kept coming nonetheless. The villagers often find themselves attacked, too.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: We tried asking the cities for help, but none of the nobles cared about a little village like ours. It wasn't until we took our wounded to Rhodes Island that we found out about this company.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: *Sigh*... Thanks for your help.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Don't worry, sir, we'll do all we can to solve this problem.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If I may ask, did the village have any run-ins with Originium slugs before this?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Well, they'd pay us a visit once in a while, but usually it's just a couple of them chewing on the hops in the fields, and they'd run the moment they spotted us.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: We never saw any slugs that big, much less ones that would attack humans.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: So there's always been Originium slugs in this area, then...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The woods outside the village are pretty uneven terrain. Not even I know exactly what's going on in there.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Aside from that, have you noticed anything out of the ordinary in the village lately?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Like, have there been any strange visitors? Or a sudden change in climate? Please try to remember. All of this is very important.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If I have to say, the only brewery in the village went out of business three months ago. Some of the men were attacked by the slugs when they were delivering hops to other towns.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Any ideas?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir, but could you take us to the other places where there have been sightings of Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Alright. Come with me.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Huh? What are those folks doing over there?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Why are there so many dead slugs on the ground?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Stop what you're doing!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Dad—
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Chief, perfect timing. We found the culprit behind all this.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: No wonder we couldn't catch them. All of the Originium slugs have been hiding here with this family.
attributes.name: Spectating Villager

attributes.content: Horrible. How could someone keep these monsters inside their home?
attributes.name: Spectating Villager

attributes.content: Did all of you kill these Originium slugs?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Chief, we all saw it. You have to make sure this guy's dealt with properly.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*...
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: You killed all my Originium slugs. What more do you want?
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: What more do we want?!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Do you know how many people were hurt because your slugs bit them? They might even get infected! Let's not even mention our crops! You can't stay here anymore! We won't allow it! Your whole family's got to go!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: People like you should die in the wilderness!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Yeah! To hell with all of you! Leave Rockvile right now!
attributes.name: Spectating Villager

attributes.content: That wasn't my slugs...
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: No? Then why don't you explain why you were keeping these monsters?!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Why should I tell you?! It's not my slugs' fault that your brewery went under!
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Skurwysyny—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Explain this. What's with the slugs?
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: They're for brewing...
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: It's something that I discovered by accident. When Originium slugs eat hops, they secrete a special liquid, and it makes beer taste much better.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: I told the others about it before. I wanted to promote this kind of brewing, but everyone said I was nuts...
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Well, that's something. I didn't know you could do that. Now I gotta try it.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: I think I heard the traveling caravans mention something like that when I was back home.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hey, who the hell are you two? Stay out of this!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: They are Oripathy experts I invited to help us solve this problem. Mind your manners.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Hey, dude, chill out a little. Think about it. These Originium slugs are tiny. How are they supposed to bite anyone? It'd take years for them to chew up a huge plantation like that.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Besides, didn't your search team find mutant Originium slugs outside the village? There's no reason to slaughter your neighbor's pets.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: *Spit*—Say whatever you want, but I never saw any of those giant slugs they kept talking about, and all the people on the search team are in the hospital right now.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Who knows if these Oripathy-infested bugs knew some weird kind of Arts? If he's keeping these filthy things in his house, he's got to be up to no good!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Originium slugs can't get Oripathy!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We only call them Originium slugs because their outer shells contain Originium. They don't have any crystals inside their bodies.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They've been studied by many, many biologists out there, and even though no one knows why, no one has ever found an Originium slug that's been infected with Oripathy naturally.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And it's nearly impossible to come down with Oripathy from an Originium slug bite.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Please don't frame an innocent man with baseless accusations like that.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Why should I believe—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Sir, please give us a little time. We'll get to the bottom of this. But before we do, could you please not make things so hard on this man?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: O-Of course...
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Please let us go outside the village to investigate. My guess is that the Originium slugs who wrecked the fields didn't stay in the village.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yes, of course, but I'm afraid you might find the woods and hills outside a little difficult to traverse with just the two of you.
attributes.name: Village Headman

attributes.content: Alright, I'll go with them. Let me see for myself those mutant slugs they're talking about.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Alright, that sounds good. Time is tight, so let's get going.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Ugh. The forest is too dense. I can't see anything.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hmph, and here I was wondering how amazing you two would be with how cocksure you were.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Better drop the tough act and go home.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Look! Behind you!
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Eek!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: There's nothing there...?
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Hah, look at you. You say all that, but you're actually scared shitless, hoping we don't run into any of the slugs.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Quiet down, please. Now is not the time for a fight.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Humans may be afraid of Originium slugs, but they're really scared of humans too. They don't usually go anywhere near human settlements.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Even if they run into humans by chance, they usually run away on their own. So they shouldn't be that close to the village. We just left the village, so it's not a surprise that we haven't found any yet.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: So what do you think of this whole thing?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Normally, when a swarm of wild slugs suddenly becomes aggressive, the most likely reason is that their habitat has gone through a sudden, drastic change.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: When that happens, you just have to guide them properly. That's usually all that it takes to calm the aggressive slugs down.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But to figure out what exactly happened here, we have to first find where the Originium slugs lived in the forest.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: This is a huge forest, though. How are we supposed to look?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hm... Let's see.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If the slugs are regularly attacking the village, that has to mean their area of activity has gotten very large. If we look carefully, we should be able to find...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Look, there it is! Chard, look!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What's this...? Wild hops?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Yeah! Look, and it's pretty spread out. I don't think it grew here naturally.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: According to the village chief, the Originium slugs here probably love eating hops, and when they don't digest the seeds, they get spread all over.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: So you're saying that wherever we find hops, they've been there?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: I can't say for certain, but it's very likely!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Amazing, Vanilla!
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: H-Hey... no big deal.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We've been following the girl for ages. Where's the mutant slugs you've been talking about?
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Look over there.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hah, save it. You're not fooling me twice—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: (Pulls bowstring)
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Even if you—Eek!!!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Hold on, Chard!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It's not hostile.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Stares)
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: It's noticed us...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Look, it's leaving.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Phew... Scared me to death. I wasn't sure I could take that slug down with how big it is.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hey... Why did you let it go?
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: It didn't attack us. There's no reason to provoke it.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: You've got to be kidding me!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: If you don't kill it now, it might come back to ruin our crops and attack our people!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: That's not the mutant Originium slugs we're looking for...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It noticed us just now, but it didn't attack us. That means its habits are no different from regular Originium slugs. It won't come close to humans.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It could just be—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: I promise you. We'll do our best to solve the problem the village is saving, but can't we spare the innocent?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hmph... You'd better keep your word.
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Thanks, Chard.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: No problem. I trust your judgment.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: So doesn't that mean we've found the slugs? That just goes to show what an expert in Originium slugs you are.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: You're exaggerating. I just know a thing or two about them, is all.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I used to run into critters like these a lot back in Vouivre. I've always thought of them as nothing different from other animals. They're all cute little things.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Instructor Dobermann always tells me that I hesitate too much when facing Originium slugs in battle, and I know that's not a good thing...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: But when we're not in a fight, I want to save as many of them as possible, if that's okay. I mean, they're innocent lives...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hey, cheer up a little. I think you're right.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: I never had a pet Originium slugs, but I had other pets when I was a kid. I know how it feels.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: And actually, if we get the chance, I kind of want to meet your little Kuro sometime, hahaha.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: R-Really...? We'd love that!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hey, is there a cave over there...?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: This place... If I remember correctly...
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Dear God...
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: This... This...
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: The three of them walk up to the cave's entrance.
Half of the cave is colored dark yellow with the Originium waste strewn inside, while the waste itself is densely covered with eggs.
Further inside the cave, red glows can be seen pulsating rhythmically in the shadows like a breathing pattern, enough for the three to just barely make out their terrifyingly large silhouettes.
Help... help me—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Shut up! Don't move. If you startle them, it's all over!
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Vanilla... What do we do?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Vanilla...?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Let's get out of here for the time being...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I know different countries have different standards when it comes to Originium waste disposal, but this... This looks illegal just about everywhere.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir? You said you worked at the brewery before, right?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Did you know all the Originium waste was dumped in the mountains after the factory shut down?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: It wasn't me... I didn't do this...
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: No... It was the boss who made us do this. I didn't know this was going to happen—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Hey, what are you two spacing out there for? Hurry up and kill the slugs!
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: How come...?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: How come you're making that sound like the natural thing to do?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They lived here, and it was you who ruined their home. In the end, you even want to kill them because of your mistakes?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Vanilla, calm down...
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Come on... They're just slugs—
attributes.name: Angry Villager

attributes.content: Just Originium slugs...?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You're the ones who turned them into mutants, and now you're saying you want to kill them without batting an eye.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: When you don't understand the truth, your instinct is to lay the blame on those around you, condemning them to death.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Is it so easy for you to judge whether a life has value?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Vanilla, snap out of it!
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: If Chard didn't stop her, Vanilla would not have noticed how tightly she was gripping her halberd.
Sorry...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We'll talk sense into this guy later. What do we do now?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: There's... nothing we can do.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'm sorry. We came too late. We weren't able to... save your Originium slugs...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Don't say that. You cleared my name, and for that I'm thankful.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: The man earlier wanted us to tell you that he's sorry for what he's done. He said he won't give you any more trouble.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: *Sigh*, and here I really wanted a sip of your secret brew.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Hahaha, looks like that's not going to happen.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: I'm just glad we got the misunderstanding cleared up... but even though this is behind us, everyone here is probably traumatized by Originium slugs, and I don't want to give anyone any more trouble.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: But I'm sure someone out there has discovered this same brewing technique. Maybe you'll come across a special slug beer someday. Make sure you try some when you do.
attributes.name: Honest Villager

attributes.content: Hah, I gotta keep that in mind.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Ma'am, are there really mutant slugs outside?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Don't you worry. They've gone somewhere else. The Originium slugs won't attack the village anymore.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Really? I was so scared when everyone said there were monsters outside...
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: You don't need to be so scared... Actually, they're really scared too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They aren't monsters. They're just like us. They are just living things trying their hardest to survive in this world.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Mm... Oh yeah, you should take this.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: Is that...?!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: When those men charged inside, I hid one of the slugs on me... but I only had the time to save one of them.
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I guess I can't keep it. Could you take care of it?
attributes.name: Little Girl

attributes.content: I'll look after him, yes!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: The explosives are ready to go. All that's left is setting them off, and there's more than enough in there to blow the entire cave.
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: But... Vanilla, are you sure there's no other way?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: It's obvious that these are the slugs that attacked the village...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: They've lived in an Originium-dense environment like this for so long that their bodies have mutated. Not only have they grown dramatically, they've gotten very aggressive.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: We don't know the exact cause, but we don't have the time to get to the bottom of it.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: If we just leave them be, they will destroy all the villages nearby sooner or later... We have to do this.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hey, you okay?
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Chard, give me the trigger.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: You don't have to—Alright...
attributes.name: Operator Chard

attributes.content: Sorry...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Yep... Incubator, food, water... Everything's the same as Kuro.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: This is your new home. Welcome home!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Whoa, another one? Not bad, Vanilla. You find yourself a new pet every time you go out on a field mission... Did Dr. Kal'tsit really give you permission to keep so many pets?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Of course. Just like Kuro and Tiny, he's registered.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: This place is starting to feel like an Originium slug museum... What's the new guy called?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: He looks a tad bit rounder than Kuro. Okay, you'll be Puffball! Kuro, Tiny, be sure to get along with Puffball. Don't pick on him!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Vanilla? Why are you crying...?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Huh? Am I?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I... I'm fine... *Sobs*... Franka... I... I didn't run away this time... I did it...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: *Sobs*... Waaaaaaaaaahhhh!!!
attributes.name: Vanilla
